content:
Is anyone else getting the following: Publishing Content Failed: Can't get https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/vrdr/fhir-single.xsd to /scratch/ig-build-temp-5T7QEG/repo/input-cache/schemas-r5/fhir-single.xsd

I've backed out my last modification and still I get this error. Any insights regarding the cause or resolution would be appreciated. TIA AMS

All builds using hl7.fhir.template since about 3:30pm Pacific US time are failing. fhir.base.template is working. I believe @Lloyd McKenzie is aware, but not sure what the issue is. I don't know if he is actively working on it.
See: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/build.20with.20hl7.2Efhir.2Etemplate

Corey Spears said:

All builds using hl7.fhir.template since about 3:30pm Pacific US time are failing. fhir.base.template is working. I believe Lloyd McKenzie is aware, but not sure what the issue is. I don't know if he is actively working on it.
See: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/build.20with.20hl7.2Efhir.2Etemplate

Thanks for the update @Corey Spears
